page.title: 03DOUGLAS SQUARE
page.content: {DOUGLAS SQUARE 81 people live in{Douglas}Square.All the people who were asked liked living in the{square. Quite a few people would like a chemist, more shops, better bus service, a swimming pool, a caravan park and more nightlife. Some people would like no improvements at all. What people like most is the friendly people, peace and quiet, living in the country, and the environment. People dislike being too far away from town, the transport to the towns, too much gossip, and the weather. Though some people liked everything about{Newcastleton.
